welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Forest Hill, a charming city known for its picturesque forests and friendly community. We hope you'll take some time to explore and experience all the beauty this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Meacham Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Meacham Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Addison Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Addison Airport is exclusively for private flights and their passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arlington Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The largest terminal at DFW, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at DFW, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The third largest terminal at DFW, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: The international terminal at DFW, serving flights to and from various international destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The newest terminal at DFW, primarily serving American Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: The future terminal at DFW, currently under construction and set to open in 2025.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout all terminals and concourses.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fort Worth Alliance Airport handles shipments for various airlines and freight companies.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redbird Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Love Field Airport serves all domestic flights.

terminals.name: Southwest Terminal
terminals.description: The Southwest Terminal at Love Field Airport is dedicated to Southwest Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
